/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky above. Street signs and lampposts are scattered along the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. In the distance, mountains rise against the sky, adding a touch of nature's grandeur to the urban landscape.
